channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16750] hbase compilation failed on power system
item.description:
Hi,

hbase compilation failed on IBM power system ppc64le architecture with below error:


Hbase Failure:

[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------

[INFO] BUILD FAILURE

[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------

[INFO] Total time: 04:33 min

[INFO] Finished at: 2016-09-30T08:58:47-04:00

[INFO] Final Memory: 215M/843M

[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.asciidoctor:asciidoctor-maven-plugin:1.5.2.1:process-asciidoc (output-pdf) on project hbase: Execution output-pdf of goal org.asciidoctor:asciidoctor-maven-plugin:1.5.2.1:process-asciidoc failed: (NotImplementedError) fstat unimplemented unsupported or native support failed to load -> [Help 1]

org.apache.maven.lifecycle.LifecycleExecutionException: Failed to execute goal org.asciidoctor:asciidoctor-maven-plugin:1.5.2.1:process-asciidoc (output-pdf) on project hbase: Execution output-pdf of goal org.asciidoctor:asciidoctor-maven-plugin:1.5.2.1:process-asciidoc failed: (NotImplementedError) fstat unimplemented unsupported or native support failed to load

	at org.apache.maven.lifecycle.internal.LifecycleStarter.execute(LifecycleStarter.java:128)

	at org.apache.maven.DefaultMaven.doExecute(DefaultMaven.java:307)

	at org.apache.maven.DefaultMaven.doExecute(DefaultMaven.java:193)

	at org.apache.maven.DefaultMaven.execute(DefaultMaven.java:106)

	at org.apache.maven.cli.MavenCli.execute(MavenCli.java:863)

	at org.apache.maven.cli.MavenCli.doMain(MavenCli.java:288)

Caused by: org.apache.maven.plugin.PluginExecutionException: Execution output-pdf of goal org.asciidoctor:asciidoctor-maven-plugin:1.5.2.1:process-asciidoc failed: (NotImplementedError) fstat unimplemented unsupported or native support failed to load

	at org.apache.maven.plugin.DefaultBuildPluginManager.executeMojo(DefaultBuildPluginManager.java:145)

	at org.apache.maven.lifecycle.internal.MojoExecutor.execute(MojoExecutor.java:207)

	... 20 more

Caused by: org.jruby.exceptions.RaiseException: (NotImplementedError) fstat unimplemented unsupported or native support failed to load

	at org.jruby.RubyFile.size(org/jruby/RubyFile.java:1108)

	at RUBY.render_body(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj-pdf/1.5.0-alpha.6/asciidoctorj-pdf-1.5.0-alpha.6.jar!/gems/pdf-core-0.2.5/lib/pdf/core/document_state.rb:69)

	at RUBY.each(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj-pdf/1.5.0-alpha.6/asciidoctorj-pdf-1.5.0-alpha.6.jar!/gems/pdf-core-0.2.5/lib/pdf/core/object_store.rb:70)

	at org.jruby.RubyArray.each(org/jruby/RubyArray.java:1613)

	at RUBY.each(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj-pdf/1.5.0-alpha.6/asciidoctorj-pdf-1.5.0-alpha.6.jar!/gems/pdf-core-0.2.5/lib/pdf/core/object_store.rb:69)

	at RUBY.render_body(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj-pdf/1.5.0-alpha.6/asciidoctorj-pdf-1.5.0-alpha.6.jar!/gems/pdf-core-0.2.5/lib/pdf/core/document_state.rb:68)

	at RUBY.render_body(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj-pdf/1.5.0-alpha.6/asciidoctorj-pdf-1.5.0-alpha.6.jar!/gems/prawn-1.2.1/lib/prawn/document/internals.rb:141)

	at RUBY.render(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj-pdf/1.5.0-alpha.6/asciidoctorj-pdf-1.5.0-alpha.6.jar!/gems/prawn-1.2.1/lib/prawn/document.rb:359)

	at RUBY.render_file(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj-pdf/1.5.0-alpha.6/asciidoctorj-pdf-1.5.0-alpha.6.jar!/gems/prawn-1.2.1/lib/prawn/document.rb:376)

	at org.jruby.RubyIO.open(org/jruby/RubyIO.java:1181)

	at RUBY.render_file(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj-pdf/1.5.0-alpha.6/asciidoctorj-pdf-1.5.0-alpha.6.jar!/gems/prawn-1.2.1/lib/prawn/document.rb:376)

	at RUBY.write(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj-pdf/1.5.0-alpha.6/asciidoctorj-pdf-1.5.0-alpha.6.jar!/gems/asciidoctor-pdf-1.5.0.alpha.6/lib/asciidoctor-pdf/converter.rb:1235)

	at RUBY.write(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj/1.5.2/asciidoctorj-1.5.2.jar!/gems/asciidoctor-1.5.2/lib/asciidoctor/document.rb:1051)

	at RUBY.convert(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj/1.5.2/asciidoctorj-1.5.2.jar!/gems/asciidoctor-1.5.2/lib/asciidoctor.rb:1504)

	at RUBY.convert_file(/grid/0/jenkins/.m2/repository/org/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj/1.5.2/asciidoctorj-1.5.2.jar!/gems/asciidoctor-1.5.2/lib/asciidoctor.rb:1562)

	at RUBY.convertFile(<script>:68)

	at org.jruby.gen.InterfaceImpl537412764.convertFile(org/jruby/gen/InterfaceImpl537412764.gen:13)

[ERROR]

[ERROR]

[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:

[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/PluginExecutionException

As per this recommendation if we update asciidoctor version it fixes the problem


https://github.com/asciidoctor/asciidoctorj/issues/402

Please find the patch attached.
item.summary: hbase compilation failed on power system

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment: Any concerns with this, Misty Stanley-Jones?

-1 overall

HBASE-16750 hbase compilation failed on power system (Saravanan (tedyu: rev 1f71070a0773f28f07d40e8e41b46a616c73999b)

  • (edit) pom.xml

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-Trunk_matrix #1722 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1722/)
HBASE-16750 hbase compilation failed on power system (Saravanan (tedyu: rev cc237c4b78517a6b370c55c8573b14c9edf683de)

  • (edit) pom.xml

If there isn't a quick fix to this by adjusting our POM to the latest version of a plugin, we should resolve it as wontfix. It's not in our remit to fix asciidoctor maven plugin issues. Please open a ticket with the appropriate project.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-Trunk_matrix #1726 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1726/)
HBASE-16750 hbase compilation failed on power system - revert due to (tedyu: rev 34ad9652ae1b15722db0e75a447283eba614f24c)

  • (edit) pom.xml

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-1.4 #446 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-1.4/446/)
HBASE-16750 hbase compilation failed on power system - revert due to (tedyu: rev 5a9f604dd37cbc4a795728242037df3531714bf4)

  • (edit) pom.xml

Starting asciidoctorj-pdf plugin v1.5.0-alpha.10 an additional parameter has been introducted to generate pdfmarks file. Below change works on hbasr master and branch-1 branches when I tested it locally.


              <attributes>

                <docVersion>${project.version}</docVersion>

                <sourcedir>${project.build.sourceDirectory}</sourcedir>

                <pdfmarks/>

              </attributes>

I have attached the pdf files generated from these branches and updated patches with this ticket.

Does the compilation failure happen on Power only?
Hmm. why does the patch fix the problem on Power?

Hmm. why does the patch fix the problem on Power?

I meant how.

Powered by Apache Yetus 0.3.0 http://yetus.apache.org

This message was automatically generated.

Jerry He

asciidoctor-maven-plugin version 1.5.2.1 fails to write in /tmp on power ppc64el4 as it do not support "xfs" filesystem (Default filesystem pf ppc.) Version 1.5.3 introduced the support to write on xfs, asciidoctor-maven-plugin writes to /tmp while generating pdfs.

Jerry He:
Any more question(s) ?

Ok.
Does it work for you on PPC? With the jruby 1.6.8 that HBase currently uses?

There is an existing issue with jruby on PPC HBASE-13338.

It worked for us. I have attached the pdf file generated using this plugin with this ticket.

Let us know if you have any more questions.
Fine with me then.
Thanks for the patch, Saravanan

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-1.4 #449 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-1.4/449/)
HBASE-16750 hbase compilation failed on power system (Saravanan (tedyu: rev 8203e02a2f5078c9090f2be68a2faf380356fa6b)

  • (edit) pom.xml

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-Trunk_matrix #1738 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1738/)
HBASE-16750 hbase compilation failed on power system (Saravanan (tedyu: rev d1e40bf0bda4d82ab217e6b715e7c4dd5a6b9af2)

  • (edit) pom.xml

This was the build 16750 went into:

https://builds.apache.org/job/hbase_generate_website/368/

which was green.

This seems to be build environment issue.

Build #368 (green) was on H4 while #369 was on H0. #370 was on H1.

Build #372 on ubuntu-5 was also red, so I've reverted the last commit done for this JIRA to try to get our website builds back to green. A deeper analysis of the dependency tree changes introduced by this fix needs to be done. If there's no interest in doing that, let's just close this as won't fix.

Dima:
Can you post the link to Jenkins build on ubuntu-5 ?

The link is at the bottom of the daily email to dev@. For posterity, the failed build on ubuntu-5 from earlier today is here. After reverting your commit, a build on H1 succeeded, despite another build on the same machine failing a few days back with the same org.jruby.exceptions.RaiseException: (NotImplementedError) fstat unimplemented unsupported or native support failed to load error when the commit was present.
Thanks for the summary.

Hbase site is working on our local ubuntu build machines. Below are the details:


jenkins@u12-slave-4c6292b0-1:~/workspace/build-support$ uname -a

Linux u12-slave-4c6292b0-1 3.2.0-74-virtual #109-Ubuntu SMP Tue Dec 9 17:04:48 UTC 2014 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

JAVA: /grid/0/jenkins/tools/jdk7/jdk1.7.0_21

Maven: /grid/0/jenkins/tools/maven/apache-maven-3.3.9/bin/mvn

Please try Java 8 Oracle JDK.
Master branch is only built with Java 8.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build HBase-Trunk_matrix #1762 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1762/)
Revert "HBASE-16750 hbase compilation failed on power system (Saravanan (dimaspivak: rev 3c35a722d9c1c77826d7c86ee204274bfdaae65f)

  • (edit) pom.xml

I am able to reproduce the issue locally on Ubuntu 12 machine:

org.jruby.exceptions.RaiseException: (NotImplementedError) fstat unimplemented unsupported or native support failed to load

This issue happens because Ubuntu libc6 package doesn't have a file named "libcrypt.so" and JRuby tries to load that. There are two work arounds:

  1. Install the libc6-dev package
  2. or, run ln -s /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcrypt.so.1 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcrypt.so

I tried creating symbolic link ( solution #2) and I don't see that issue any more.

For reference:

  • https://github.com/elastic/logstash/issues/3127#issuecomment-101068714
